completedItems.title: fix: use correct twitter post interval config in plugin-twitter package
completedItems.body:
# Background

## What does this PR do?

fix: use config TWITTER_POST_INTERVAL_MIN and TWITTER_POST_INTERVAL_MAX instead of TWITTER_POST_INTERVAL)

completedItems.title: feat: twitter plugin - Cleanup Unused Code and Support Long Tweets for Premium Accounts
completedItems.body: This PR removes unused code in the Twutter plugin and adds support for posting and replying with long tweets for premium accounts
